format: A data frame with 49 observations on the following 3 variables.
title: Competition between two biotypes
description:
Description
To assess the competitive ability between two biotypes of Lolium rigidum, one resistant to glyphosate
and the other a sensitive wild type, the density of resistant and sensitive biotypes was counted after
germination.
reference: A hyperbolic model (Jensen, 1993) is describing the data reasonably well.

parameters.x: a numeric vector with densities of the sensitive biotype (plants/m2)
parameters.z: a numeric vector with densities of the resistant biotype (plants/m2)
parameters.biomass: a numeric vector of biomass weight (g/plant)
